Version 2.0.6 - Enhanced SCORM Slide Tracking

New Features

  • Enhanced suspend_data parsing for multiple vendor formats (Articulate, iSpring, Captivate, etc.)
  • Added polling fallback to detect slide changes every 2 seconds
  • Added MutationObserver to detect DOM-based navigation
  • Added postMessage listener for internal SCORM navigation events
  • Added debug logging to help identify SCORM data format

Improvements

  • Support for Base64-encoded suspend_data (Articulate Storyline)
  • Support for URL-encoded suspend_data (Adobe Captivate)
  • Support for JSON suspend_data with nested structures

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.5: Initial enhanced SCORM tracking
  • v2.0.4: Version bump
  • v2.0.3: Notification URLs use relative paths
  • v2.0.2: Support Moodle 4.x normalized SCORM tables
  • v2.0.1: Use cmi.core.score.raw for SCORM progress
  • v2.0.0: WebSocket event observers for real-time progress
